issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description: when a parent allocator is closed, we should report the child allocators if any are outstanding. This helps in debugging memory leaks - will tell if the leak happened in the parent or the child.
fields.summary: [Java] report outstanding child allocators on parent allocator close
